title: I Hid the Duke’s Daughter - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Charming Protagonist   Childcare   Cute Children   Cute Story   Doting Parents   European Ambience   Familial Love   Family   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Long Separations   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lovers Reunited   Nobles   Single Parent   Time Skip
author: Rana
description:
The penniless noblewoman Evelyn and the Empire’s only duke, Islay. It was a relationship that wasn’t meant to be, so she couldn’t tell him.

“I’m actually pregnant with your child.”

Then Islay’s grandmother came to visit.

“10,000 derk. This should be enough for you to get lost.”

But now she had to protect the child she carried.

“100,000 derk.”

“What?”

“If it’s not that much, I won’t break up with him.”

Then she disappeared from the capital.

Seven years passed.

And Islay finally found his lost lover.>
